message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! However, I need to make a profit, so I can offer you a compromise. I can sell the product to you for $180, which is a $20 discount from the original price.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $180 and $160, so I can offer it to you for $170. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $165?

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $167.50. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?

I've already offered you a price of $167.50, and you're asking me to go back to $160? I'm not willing to go back on that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $167.50 and $160, so I can offer it to you for $163.75. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're not willing to go back to $160, but I'm still not comfortable with $163.75. Would you be willing to meet me at $162?

I've made a lot of concessions already, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $163.75. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory that normally costs $25. So, the total value you'll get is $163.75 for the product plus $25 for the accessory, making it a total of $188.75. This is my final offer.
